Gold from Lead.name: Gold from Lead
Gold from Lead.desc: Boosts all Golden Food bonuses by +10%

Loot Table Tampering.name: Loot Table Tampering
Loot Table Tampering.desc: All items from Random Event Bosses are 1.20x more likely to drop than before.

Artifact Pilfering.name: Artifact Pilfering
Artifact Pilfering.desc: Boosts Artifact find chance by a pleasantly large +20%

The Art of the Flail.name: The Art of the Flail
The Art of the Flail.desc: Look buddy, I ain't got no more bribes, maybe an associate of mine will sort it out later...

Forge Cap Smuggling.name: Forge Cap Smuggling
Forge Cap Smuggling.desc: Boosts Forge Capacity by a smoking hot 1.30x

Nugget Fabrication.name: Nugget Fabrication
Nugget Fabrication.desc: Boosts the rate at which the Shovel generates Nuggets in Gaming by +20%

Divine PTS Miscounting.name: Divine PTS Miscounting
Divine PTS Miscounting.desc: Boosts Divinity PTS gain rate by +30%
